dialogue.introduction: Yayoi, reporting for duty... Pleased to meet you. Please don't be too concerned about me...
dialogue.library_intro: Third of the Mutsuki-class destroyers, 'Yayoi'. I was born at Uraga, Yokosuka. Mutsuki, Mochizuki and I did our best as a task force. I dislike dive bombers. Please take good care of me.
dialogue.secretary2: Eh...? Yayoi, isn't angry you know? ...Sorry for having such a stiff expression.
dialogue.secretary3: Like I said, I'm not angry... Please don't be so concerned about me...
dialogue.secretaryidle: Yes, I'm fine... Please take your time. Yayoi will be here... Yes, I'll be...
dialogue.secretarymarried: If the Commander is upbeat, that's good. Yayoi's good too, then.
dialogue.wedding: Commande~r. Com...mander... It's hard. Hawawa!? W-were you listening? I see... thank goodness. No, that's good. Commander... Erm... thanks for everything. Let's keep going together... okay?
dialogue.show_players_score: Uhm... A report for the commander...
dialogue.supply: Is it alright for me to get this?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Yayoi shall be going for some repairs.
dialogue.docking_complete: A ship has been fully repaired.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been completed.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: OK, Mutsuki, Mochizuki, let's go... Yayoi, heading out!
dialogue.night_battle: Chasing the enemy. Leave it to me...
dialogue.mvp: Ye...yes, Yayoi was important... uh... um... I'm kind of...happy.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: That does it... I'm not angry... I'm not.. angry...
dialogue.sunk: I'm... sinking... Mutsuki, I'm... joining you... as well...
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Commander, here....t-these are for you. They're sweet. Don't worry about getting me....anything.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander, congratz... on the two years anniversary. Yayoi... is happy too. Yup.
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Rainy season... Ah, this teru teru bozu... is cute... please... don't mind me...
dialogue.christmas_2015: Christmas... Ah, Yayoi isn't angry or anything. I will have some cake.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Mocchi... Mochizuki, we're cleaning so... You wipe that with a damp cloth... Ah, no... I'm not mad.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral... Happy New Year. Please take care of me this year too.
